set.name: Beauty Elixir II: Healing Bouquet
set.description: Flower Power for combination skin. Beauty Elixir II: Healing Bouquet is a 100% active formula replete with free radical-quenching CoQ10, collagen-inspiring Vitamin C ester, and a rainbow of phytonutrients, essential fatty acids, and natural actives from select plant sources to continually calm, soothe, and inspire radiant, supple skin.

things.name: Licorice Isolate
things.description: Stearyl Glycyrrhetinate (From Licorice) - The fatty acid form of the antiirritant glycyrrhetinic acid. Derived from licorice, this isolated compound helps to keep histamine fussiness from appearing on the surface of the skin. Derived from Licorice in the USA.

things.name: Wild Crafted Prickly Pear Seed Oil
things.what: Wild Crafted Prickly Pear Seed Oil
things.description: Opuntia engelmanii (Prickly Pear Seed) Oil - Our cold pressed certified Organic, wild crafted Prickly Pear Seed Oil is an excellent source of Vitamin E containing 150% more than what is found in Argan Oil. Rich in minerals, amino acids, and over 80% unsaturated fatty acids this oil is prized for its calming, healing, and anti-inflammatory properties which improve skin elasticity. The Prickly Pear Seed Oil found in KYPRIS products is Wild crafted from the Arizona high deserts.

things.name: Certified, Bio Identical CoQ10
things.description: CoQ10, Ubiquinone - CoQ10 steadily declines as tissues age. Some studies indicate depletion of CoQ10 correlates with a variety of ills. From the only company to make bio-identical​ CoQ10 in the USA via a patented process, the CoQ10 in KYPRIS products has been recognized as the gold standard in antioxidant care. As a functional ingredient, it has shown to diminish the appearance of sun damage when used continuously for six months at the concentration included in the KYPRIS Beauty Elixirs. The CoQ10 found in KYPRIS products is created by fermenting yeast in an oxygen-free environment in the beautiful USA.

things.name: Organic Sunflower Seed Oil
things.description: Helianthus annuus (Sunflower Seed) Oil - Sunflower seed oil provides an easily absorbed lipid profile rich in unsaturated fatty acids as well as Vitamin A precursor, beta carotene, Vitamin D, and Vitamin E. It provides an excellent layer of protection for all skin types and keeps the skin moisturized and healthy. The sunflower seed oil used in KYPRIS products is organic, sustainably grown, and locally procured from California.

things.name: High Altitude Lavender Essential Oil
things.description:
Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) Oil - One of science’s most well documented
healing essential oils, our sparkly lavender is grown and distilled at altitude which
allows some volatile compounds to evaporate off leaving a sweeter, more gentle, hydrating,
and healing oil. All of the Lavender found in KYPRIS products is sustainably grown,
procured, and distilled in France.

things.name: Organic Pomegranate Extract
things.description: Punica granatum (Pomegranite Seed) Extract - A fatty oil with more than 60% punicic acid, a valuable conjugated linolenic acid (CLA) studied for its UV protective properties and anti-tumoral effects. Produced by super critical carbon dioxide extraction, it contains tocopherols, sterols, and a small amount of squalene. Known to calm and heal irritated, dry, and sensitive skin, it promotes the skin’s self-repair system and stimulates regeneration, which in turn reduces wrinkles, improves elasticity, and protects against aging. Organically grown and extracted in Germany.

things.name: Vitamin C Ester
things.description: Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate (Vitamin C Ester) – This Vitamin C Ester is a functional ingredient shown in studies to effectively support skin’s production and protection of collagen. All of the Vitamin C Ester in KYPRIS products comes from Japan.

things.name: Organic Kukui Seed Oil
things.description:
Alleurites moloccans (Kukui) Oil - Kukui Nut Oil from Hawaii’s state tree is
famous for its traditional use caring for babies’ skin. The word ‘Kukui’ is Hawaiian for
the word ‘enlightenment.’ High in linoleic and linolenic essential fatty acids, vital for the
metabolism of healthy skin, Kukui Nut Oil absorbs easily imparting its nourishing properties.
It is known for soothing irritated and sunburned complexions and has reportedly
helped to relieve itching due to eczema, psoriasis, and rosacea. The Kukui Nut Oil found
in KYPRIS products is sustainably grown and procured in the USA.

things.name: Mixed Tocopherols
things.description: Mixed Tocopherols - Our Vitamin E oil derives from certified GMO free soybeans from crop to finished material. Our Vitamin E Oil contains a complete spectrum of naturally occurring vitamin E which on its own is very healing and works in concert with Vitamin C to protect the integrity of skin. The Vitamin E oil found in KYPRIS products is sustainably farmed and synthesized in Spain.

things.name: Sea Buckthorn Extract
things.description: Hippophae rhamonides (Seabuckthorn Berry) Extract – Created via supercritical CO2 extraction of Seabuckthorn Berries, this fatty extract provides a wealth of phytosterols, carotenoids, alkanols, tocohperols, and essential fatty acids including the rare omega 7. Its properties include wound healing, alleviating sun burn, and increasing cell turn over for improved skin renewal. Phytosterols are essential components of the skin responsible for structural integrity and the stimulation of stimulate collagen synthesis all of which help to protect skin against environmental stress. The combination of its benefits leave skin soft, smooth, and revitalized. Organically grown and extracted in Germany.

things.name: Organic Baobab Seed Oil
things.description: Adonsonia digitata (Baobab) Oil - This exquisite organic oil is cold pressed from the fruit seeds on the African Baobab tree. To locals, the Baobab is known as the tree of life as the trees commonly live for 500 years. Some have reached the age of 5,000 years old. Rich in essential fatty acids, vitamins A and E, and phytosterols, baobab oil absorbs quickly and is especially beneficial for dry skin. The baobab oil included in KYPRIS products is organic, sustainably procured, and from Senegal.

things.name: Organic Pumpkin Seed Oil
things.description: Curcubita pepo (Pumpkin Seed) Oil - A highly emollient oil rich in omega 3 and omega 6 fatty acids, trace minerals, zinc and vitamins A, C, E, and K. Zinc is especially important to proper function of the immune system. The Pumpkin Seed Oil found in KYPRIS products is organically grown and sustainably procured from China.

things.name: Jasmine Flower Essential Oil
things.description:
Jasminum grandiflorum (Jasmine) Extract - Known for its uplifting sensuality,
our twice distilled Jasmine ruh increases brightens spirits and increases hydration
and softening affects on the skin. All of the Jasmine ruh found in KYPRIS products is
organically grown and distilled twice in India.

things.name: Co-op Grown Organic Rose Geranium
things.description:
Pelargonium graveolens (Rose Geranium) Oil - Revered for its multi-tasking
aromatherapeutic properties, Rose Geranium essential oil is prized for its anti-inflammatory
benefits and warm, heart-centered bouquet. The Rose Geranium in KYPRIS products
is organically grown and distilled by a Co-Op which supports sustainable agriculture in Malawi.

things.name: Black Raspberry Seed Oil
things.description: Rubus occidentalis (Black Raspberry Seed) Oil - Cold pressed Black Raspberry Seed Oil contains a wealth of antioxidants, phytonutrients, and essential fatty acids of which 30% are Omega 3. Anthocyanins found in Black Raspberries are studied for their potent radical scavenging properties and as a result anti-inflammatory action. This mechanism has been compared to the benefit of exercise on the skin. Grown and pressed in Canada.

things.name: Co-op Grown Tamanu
things.description: Calophyllum inophyllum (Tamanu) Oil - A cold pressed vegetable oil that is extracted from the fruit and seeds of a large tree that is indigenous to southeast Asia and grows in high plateaus. The oil has been used for centuries in Madagascar for treating wounds, facial neuralgia, skin ailments, and hair loss. In France, Tamanu oil is used to help heal acute skin irritations including burns, rashes, impetigo, insect bites, and abrasions. The Tamanu Oil found in KYPRIS products is co-op sourced from Tahiti.

things.name: Patchouli
things.description:
Pogostemon patchouli (Patchouli) Oil - Patchouli essential oil is known for
its balancing and grounding affects. Studies indicate that when topically applied it has
fantastic anti-inflammatory properties as well. All of the Patchouli in KYPRIS products is
gently aged to increase its sweetness and is from Sumatra.

things.name: Organic Cranberry Seed Oil
things.description: Vaccinium macrocarpon (Cranberry Seed) Oil - Testing indicates that Cranberry Seed Oil possesses the highest quantity of tocotrienols, a form of Vitamin E, of any vegetable oil. It possesses a unique balance of nourishing Omega 3, 6 and 9 essential fatty acids not found in other oils. Cranberry Seed Oil can aid in the relief of itchy, scaly, irritated skin conditions such as eczema and psoriasis. Cranberry Seed Oil also contains a significant amount of Vitamin A, from USA and Canada.

things.name: Organic Rosehip Extract
things.description: Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Extract - This reddish-yellow clear oil, produced by supercritical CO2 extraction from the fruits and seeds has a valuable fatty acid content, small amounts of stearic and palmitic acid, tocopherol and flavanoids. This makes it very useful in treating chapped skin, neurodermatitis, and irritated skin. The canina species is given the common name, dog rose, due to the belief that its medicinal value extended to curing rabies. The Rosehip Extract found in KYPRIS products is wild crafted and extracted in Germany.

things.name: Organic Coconut Oil
things.description: Cocos nucifera (Virgin Coconut) Oil - The delicately intoxicating scent is but a hint to the wealth of benefits Coconut Oil provides. A mild oil that is suitable for inflamed, irritated, or sensitive skin markedly diminishes Trans Epidermal Water Loss (TEWL), contains a high concentration of Lauric Acid which has been touted for its anti microbial as well as nourishing properties. The coconut oil used in KYPRIS products is organic, sustainably grown and harvested, certified non-GMO, and as minimally processed as possible from Kenya and occasionally the Philippines

things.name: Fair for Life Organic Coconut Oil
things.what: Fair for Life Organic Coconut Oil
things.description: Cocos nucifera (Virgin Coconut) Oil - The delicately intoxicating scent is but a hint to the wealth of benefits Coconut Oil provides. A mild oil that is suitable for inflamed, irritated, or sensitive skin markedly diminishes Trans Epidermal Water Loss (TEWL), contains a high concentration of Lauric Acid which has been touted for its anti microbial as well as nourishing properties. The coconut oil used in KYPRIS products is organic, sustainably grown and harvested, certified non-GMO, and as minimally processed as possible from Kenya and occasionally the Philippines.
